author: mhl0116
body:
Use a configurable wire time window for CSC RecHit reconstruction.

Current wire time window is from 0-15, the goal is to make this window adjustable(to a narrower one, e.g from 6-10).
The study has been done to show:
1, narrow wire time window reduces fake RecHit/Segment at high luminosity condition
2, preserves muon segment reconstruction efficiency

More details are in this twiki: https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/viewauth/CMS/UFCSCLocalRecoStudy
title: Using an adjustable wire time window for CSC RecHit building
